metadata.description: Binary flag mapping for Phase 2 data quality issues

flag_mapping.1: Contradictory values in the same row: Window Seat=True AND Aisle Seat=True
flag_mapping.4: Mismatch between Layovers count and layover locations list

1.description: Contradictory values in the same row: Window Seat=True AND Aisle Seat=True
1.fix_approach: Ensure only one of Window Seat or Aisle Seat is True in each row.

2.fix_approach: Ensure departure datetime is before arrival datetime.

4.description: Mismatch between Layovers count and layover locations list
4.fix_approach: Ensure the number of Layovers matches the number of layover locations.
